docs.lead_paragraph: Thirty years after its creation, Medicare celebrates its anniversary this summer as a rare creature in the politics of the 1990's: a big, ambitious, exceedingly popular Government program that worked. Nevertheless, it stands on the brink of extraordinary change.

headline.main: Medicare, Turning 30, Won't Be What It Was
